body_html: FYI: Alex's excellent code in PR 1465 was merged today, so you should be able to use cholesky with gradients now. We still need to add support for batch_cholesky, so I'm leaving the bug open for now.
body_text: FYI: Alex's excellent code in PR 1465 was merged today, so you should be able to use cholesky with gradients now. We still need to add support for batch_cholesky, so I'm leaving the bug open for now.
body: FYI: Alex's excellent code in PR 1465 was merged today, so you should be able to use cholesky with gradients now. We still need to add support for batch_cholesky, so I'm leaving the bug open for now.
